document_data.name: Clarry
document_data.mainbody: '''Clarry''' was a blended [[wine]] crafted primarily in [[Cormyr]] and the neighboring [[Sembia]] and [[Westgate]]. It was also sold through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.{{Cite dragon/304/Haunted: A Tale of Sembia|71}}
document_data.Description: Clarry was made by blending common table wines with [[honey]] and [[spices]]. Pink Clarry was used for special occasions.
document_data.Prices:
Clarry could be purchased in the following containers:
* Hand keg (4 [[sp]])
* Cask (2 [[gp]])
* Barrel (5 gp)
* [[Butt]] (14 gp)
* [[Tun]] (35 gp)
document_data.History: The [[War Wizard]] [[Lindavar]] preferred clarry. When he came to stay with his former mentor [[Benelaius]] in [[Ghars]], [[Cormyr]], in [[Eleint]] of [[1367 DR]], Benelaius sent [[Jasper (servant)|Jasper]] out to buy a cask. Jasper purchased one from the [[Bold Bard]], the only place in town to get it.
